data.title: I before E
data.statement:
{{I before E, except after C
or when sounding like A, as in neighbor or weigh...}}

The rhyme "I before E" is a popular mnemonic for remembering how certain words are spelled, but it has a plethora of exceptions. Given a sentence (sequence of words), determine the proportion of words containing {{ie}} or {{ei}} in which the {{i}} comes before {{e}}.

Some words have more than one instance of {{ie}} and/or {{ei}}. For this puzzle, <<only consider the first instance of this pattern for each word>>.

<<Example:>>
<<Input:>> Series letters receiving milk blister eighties sleigh
<<Output:>> 1 of 4
<<Explanation:>> There are {{4}} words that have {{ie}} or {{ei}}, and only one of them is {{ie}}. "Blister" does have both {{i}} and {{e}}, but they are not adjacent to each other, so the rule is not relevant. "Eighties" has both {{ei}} and {{ie}}, but {{ei}} comes first, so it is treated as if it does not satisfy the rule.

testCases.title: Validator Random
testCases.testIn: blister OMG breakfast niceties mackerel Steinsberg granite

testCases.title: None
testCases.testIn: cafeteria forever Malaysia Cafeteria flicking cup CAFETERIA minister mathematics craving

testCases.title: Validator None
testCases.testIn: farmer vermillion berry crass comforter sunny grasslands correcting superfluous charismatic

testCases.title: Charlie Brown
testCases.testIn: This is one rule I must remember I before E except after C Or when sounded like A as in Neighbor and Weigh Noticeable Serviceable Embraceable Replaceable Peaceable Enforceable Pronounceable Untraceable Sleigh Stein Fahrenheit

testCases.title: Validator Charlie Brown
testCases.testIn: E before I after C Seizure Leisure Seize Skein Protein Weird Either Neither Codeine Caffeine Siege however is spelled I E Otherwise use I E in Thief Believe Fiend Niece Field Brief Grief Cashier Achieve Yield

testCases.title: Not English
testCases.testIn: reinosa acetaminophen biblioteca comenzar Jehovah janeiro campanilla eidos ReInaldo telefone kalligrafiE anstiegs strEisand meiyou draperIe schiefe bieten eini­ger Formuly Tenochtitlan mieru Andrei mou shindeiru

testCases.title: Validator English
testCases.testIn: Maria velocidad Damien FOLIEN Vietnam bienvenidos kriege madamoiselle cotidiano beo­bachten­den Kovalainenem FRIESland penSAmiENto mieux Pierrot

testCases.title: Gibberish
testCases.testIn: ie ei iei EIeieEI iEIEeeEi liEieEIn nwOLiEilLeIl wuuieowjakiew eiei theoinwlina i e jwnzIIeEj

testCases.title: Validator Gibberish
testCases.testIn: ieNEeniiEI nlwnoziEI enwixieNEkkI nwixioweEEeeI wnwiEnennwEEi ieie wnziowhhsjqEWW jeionIIIIIIIIIiIIliL sjwzzzzjfopqq niwnEnkwiI eiwwwnneeEI inmmwEeE eeEEeexwqfieejwqo eie

data.inputDescription: A sequence of space-separated words to assess
data.outputDescription: [The number of words that satisfy "I before E"] {{of}} [The number of words for which the rule would be relevant (words containing either {{ie}} or {{ei}})]

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

I before E, except after C
or when sounding like A, as in neighbor or weigh...

The rhyme "I before E" is a popular mnemonic for remembering how certain words are spelled, but it has a plethora of exceptions. Given a sentence (sequence of words), determine the proportion of words containing ie or ei in which the i comes before e.

Some words have more than one instance of ie and/or ei. For this puzzle, only consider the first instance of this pattern for each word.

Example:
Input: Series letters receiving milk blister eighties sleigh
Output: 1 of 4
Explanation: There are 4 words that have ie or ei, and only one of them is ie. "Blister" does have both i and e, but they are not adjacent to each other, so the rule is not relevant. "Eighties" has both ei and ie, but ei comes first, so it is treated as if it does not satisfy the rule.
Input
A sequence of space-separated words to assess
Output
[The number of words that satisfy "I before E"] of [The number of words for which the rule would be relevant (words containing either ie or ei)]
Constraints
1 ≤ Number of words ≤ 50
1 ≤ Length of word ≤ 25
All words use only the characters a-zA-Z
Example
Input
sister receipt pufferfish SCIence
Output
1 of 2
